lead_paragraph: Lionsgate didn’t have the No. 1 movie three weeks in a row after all.
snippet: Lionsgate didn’t have the No. 1 movie three weeks in a row after all.

headline.main: ‘Last Exorcism’ Drops From Top Box Office Spot
